description:
Allen is a 19 year old who just started college on a wrestling scholarship. He tried football and soccer, but it was wrestling that he fell in love with. He attributes his body to good genes and a healthy diet. I am sure that rolling around on the floor with another guy — competitively of course — also helped give him a great chest and muscle butt.
He's studying business, which is something that I would not have expected. But his beautiful blue eyes lit up when he started talking about international markets, traveling and taking his education abroad.
"What do you want to be when you grow up?" I joked.
"I'm really into financial institutions and the stock market. You know, all aspects of business. Lately, I've been getting into international business...I wanna explore the world. I want to get out there."
title: Allen
